description: This notification is sent when an alarm starts. Variable bindings
from omcNetworkElementTable are left blank if the information is not
available for the alarmed network element.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasNotifyNewAlarm JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmObjectInstance s EXAMPLE JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmNotificationId u 9999 JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmEventTime s EXAMPLEE JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmSystemDN s EXAMPLE JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmNotificationType s EXAMPLE JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmProbableCause s EXAMPLE JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmPerceivedSeverity s EXAMPLE JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmType s EXAMPLE JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmId u 1 JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmAdditionalText s EXAMPLE

description: Description.

description: Description.
variables.name: JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmEventTime

description: Description.

description: Description.
variables.name: JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmNotificationType

description: The complete path identifying the device or component.
Path elements are separated by the '/'. Each path element
identifies a component or device which is controlled by, or
communicates through, the device identified by the preceding
path element. The '/' path identifies the OMC server itself.
variables.name: JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmProbableCause

description: ITU perceived severity values.
variables.name: JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmPerceivedSeverity

description: This object provides a textual description of the active alarm.
The resource for which this alarm is being generated is
identified by omcAlarmActiveDevicePath.
variables.name: JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmType

description: A strictly monotonically increasing integer which acts as the
index of entries within the named alarm list.
variables.name: JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmId

description: Description.
variables.name: JMA-XOAS-MIB::xoasAlarmAdditionalText

description: Description.
